note: Reference values for BBN consistency checks (light element abundances). These values are treated as an external-data anchor and should be updated with a cited dataset when preparing a publication-grade likelihood.

Y_p_primordial.source: Representative value (update with a cited dataset; used as a falsifiability anchor in the TFPT suite).

D_over_H_primordial.source: Representative value (update with a cited dataset; used as a falsifiability anchor in the TFPT suite).

N_eff_BBN.definition: Effective number of neutrino species during BBN.
N_eff_BBN.source: SM baseline (3.046) with conservative placeholder uncertainty; replace with a dedicated likelihood if needed.
